channel.title: How to make a client(help)
channel.description:
ok wanted to make a own client only thing ive done is to download others and edit on them....
i dont know were to start but i think i got to download a client base? then i dont know anything i want to have a custom client with some custom items so i can pk with d claws and dplate and much more:D
but my only problem is where is start what should i start on?
is there anything i got to download with out the models? after i get started should i start build on client.java one of the many classes? what should i do?
and i want music tab and a screenshot tab too ive found a tut but he doesnt say how to get music tab or screenshot he just tell us to download googlescape or richscape or something and then he tell us how to change backround and how to edit on sprites
if you guys know some tutorials then please post or just help me.
please
if this is in wrong section then im sorry
